title: Run id not found exception when using set tracking uri
body:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


HI TEAM,
 Without setting tracking uri able to generate metrics, below is the command we tried
mlflow run https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow-example.git -P alpha=0.2 --run-id  ecb8e7c8dfbc418cb211e7703fb61d4c 


when  i set an tracking uri to store model registry getting not found exception like below ***
#Use sqlite:///mlruns.db as the local store for tracking and registery
 mlflow.set_tracking_uri("sqlite:///mlruns.db")
PLEASE REFER BELOW ERROR**


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**(base)** C:\Users\lenovo\Desktop\mlflow>mlflow run https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow-example.git -P alpha=0.2 --run-id 810be4e0ce7c40f08a341357e7d72dd7
2021/03/15 10:53:28 INFO mlflow.projects.utils: === Fetching project from https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow-example.git into C:\Users\lenovo\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp5rbw24dd ===
